Web & Software Development

Services Prices Examples Contact

We can help you succeed online by demystifying websites, hosting, and tech in general.

Everything we do is released as open source with no contract or obligations. You don't have to pay any monthly fees and can host wherever you like - although you might choose to pay to host with us.

We have very transparent and honest pricing. We charge a flat hourly rate.

We are flexible and up for discussing anything.

We give discounts to charities, co-operatives and sustainable businesses.

Services We Offer

  • Static websites (eg Eleventy, Jekyll)
  • SEO Audits
  • Patreon marketing advice group
  • Dynamic websites (Ruby on Rails)
  • Hosting solutions and migrations
  • Expert advice and training
  • Technical support

Learn more about our services or contact us to get started.

© 2024 Chobble

Ethical web services in Prestwich, Manchester

Our code is AGPLv3 licensed

We donate 10% to the Against Malaria Foundation
